paragraphs: Image Top / Content Bottom - Long Paragraph.
This is a robust paragraph designed to test the text wrapping capabilities of the layout engine. It visually balances the image above it.
We ensure that even with multiple lines, the text maintains a safe distance from the image boundary and the footer author element.
Image Top / Content Bottom - Bullet List.
• Key Feature One: Visual Hierarchy.
• Key Feature Two: Spacing Consistency.
• Key Feature Three: Iconography integrity.
Image Top / Content Bottom - Alignment Center.
This text block is center-aligned.
It creates a symmetrical look often used for significant statements or conclusions.
Image Bottom / Content Top - Mixed Content.
Introduction paragraph setting the context.
1. First ordered item explaining detail.
2. Second ordered item adding depth.
Conclusion sentence wrapping up the idea before the image starts.
Image Bottom / Content Top - Quote Style.
"Design is intelligence made visible."
- Alina Wheeler
(Center Aligned for impact)
Image Bottom / Content Top - Right Align.
A unique layout choice.
Draws the eye to the edge.
Creates dynamic tension with the bottom image.
